title: U-Matic Remote Control Unit RM-580
brief_description: Sony U-Matic Remote Control Unit RM-580 with stickers from State Film Centre and Cinemedia. Long black cord with attachment to plug in to console. Cream tape with red text reads “U-MATIC”.
